title: If you can identify this...
content:
... I will be forever in your debt.

Thanks!

 [‹ (x) The Great Method Casco Issue X book cover - custom face by Laurenz Brunner {Horton Munson}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081004234859/http:/typophile.com/node/34895 "Go to previous forum topic") [Beeline corporate typeface - Slab serif ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081004234859/http:/typophile.com/node/49970 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pixelprank

comments.content: I wonder if it’s [Didot bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20081004234859/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/linotype_didot_bold_osf/?sample_text=SDL) with edited/triangulated serifs...

Hmmm, thanks for the suggestion vivicity. I had a feeling it may be custom but it would seriously need some work from didot to its current state. It’s the top and bottom horizontal straight lines of the S which intrigue me and are making it hard for me to identify!

Thanks again for your suggestion.
